attributes.action: Enforce that creditors are liable for all costs when non payment is proved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a small business that is owed money, our only outlet is to use a solicitor to enforce. This initially cost money, the creditor can actually sit back and wait while the small business spends money to chase payment and incur many costs. The creditor can actually wait until the day of a hearing and then agree to pay. This costs him nothing and we have no way of recovering these costs. The balance must surely change in our favour
